column1: Iâ€™m used to everyone at @PopSci being WAY smarter than me every day. But, watching my colleagues really just nail the smart, useful, and just really good COVID19 coverage has been particulalry impressive.

I am Unironically starting to think I've been hit by the Coronavirus, I showing quite a bit of symptoms including the COVID exclusive ones. 
Other fact is that I already got the flu back in winter so I doubt got two colds in one season!
